mapper.sql: t . id ,t.opus_code as opusCode,t.user_name as userName,t.user_email as userEmail,t.create_date as createDate, t.ip,t.view,t.remark,t.comment_code as commentCode
mapper.select:
select h.id,h.code,t.userName,t.remark,t.ip,t.view,t.commentCode from hj_opus h left join (select user_name as userName,opus_code,remark,ip,view,comment_code as commentCode from hj_opus_comment where id in( select max(id) from hj_opus_comment)) t on h.code = t.opus_code
and (h.keyword like concat('%',#{opusComment.keyword},'%') or h.name like concat('%',#{opusComment.keyword},'%') )
and t.user_name like concat('%',#{opusComment.userName},'%')
and h.create_by = #{createBy}

select ,s.nick_name as nickName,s.avatar as userUrl from hj_opus_comment t inner join hj_opus h on h.code = t.opus_code left join sys_user s on s.user_name = t.user_name where h.id = #{opusId} order by t.create_date desc
